des: "Sometimes coffee is a dessert in itself.  This is one of my favorite morning treats to make a Monday seem less intimidating.  You'll need a battery-powered milk frother or it's just not the same."
ins: Stir brown sugar into half-and-half until dissolved. Whip with a milk frother or small whisk. Pour coffee into a mug, and stir in caramel sauce until dissolved. Pour frothed half-and-half into coffee, and serve.
